1: -module(test2_SUITE).
    2: -compile(export_all).
    3: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
    4: 
    5: all() ->
    6:   [
    7:     db_list_test,
    8:     db_record_test,
    9:     db_ets_test,
   10:     db_dets_test,
   11:     funs_test,
   12:     lc_test,
   13:     db_distr_test,
   14:     db_distr_robust_test
   15:   ].
   16: 
   17: -define(SERVER_NODE_NAME, server).
   18: 
   19: log_start(FuncName)  -> ct:print("========== Start ~p ==========", [FuncName]).
   20: log_finish(FuncName) -> ct:print("========== Finish ~p ==========", [FuncName]).
   21: 
   22: db_list_test(_) ->
   23:   log_start(?FUNCTION_NAME),
   24: 
   25:   ct:print("Start server"),
   26:   ?assertEqual(ok, db_list:start()),
   27: 
   28:   ct:print("DB is empty. Retrieve all names, all locations"),
   29:   ?assertEqual([], db_list:all_names()),
   30:   ?assertEqual([], db_list:all_locations()),
   31: 
   32:   ct:print("Insert name to the DB"),
   33:   ?assertEqual(ok, db_list:insert("Alex", "NN")),
   34: 
   35:   ct:print("Insert the same name to the DB (already inserted)"),
   36:   ?assertEqual(already_inserted, db_list:insert("Alex", "NN")),
   37:   ?assertEqual(already_inserted, db_list:insert("Alex", "Dzerzhinsk")),
   38: 
   39:   ct:print("Insert more names to the DB"),
   40:   ?assertEqual(ok, db_list:insert("Vanya", "NN")),
   41:   ?assertEqual(ok, db_list:insert("Liza", "Dzerzhinsk")),
   42:   ?assertEqual(ok, db_list:insert("Eva", "Dzerzhinsk")),
   43: 
   44:   ct:print("Retrieve location by name from the DB"),
   45:   ?assertEqual("NN", db_list:where_is("Alex")),
   46:   ?assertEqual("NN", db_list:where_is("Vanya")),
   47:   ?assertEqual("Dzerzhinsk", db_list:where_is("Liza")),
   48:   ?assertEqual("Dzerzhinsk", db_list:where_is("Eva")),
   49: 
   50:   ct:print("Remove existed name from the DB"),
   51:   ?assertEqual(ok, db_list:remove("Eva")),
   52:   ?assertEqual({no_such_name, "Eva"}, db_list:where_is("Eva")),
   53: 
   54:   ct:print("Remove unexisted name from the DB"),
   55:   ?assertEqual({no_such_name, "Unknown"}, db_list:where_is("Unknown")),
   56:   ?assertEqual(ok, db_list:remove("Unknown")),
   57: 
   58:   ct:print("Insert some more names to the DB"),
   59:   ?assertEqual(ok, db_list:insert("Eva", "Moscow")),
   60:   ?assertEqual("Moscow", db_list:where_is("Eva")),
   61:   ?assertEqual(ok, db_list:insert("Lyuba", "NN")),
   62:   ?assertEqual("NN", db_list:where_is("Lyuba")),
   63: 
   64:   ct:print("Retrieve names by location from the DB"),
   65:   NamesNN = db_list:located_at("NN"),
   66:   ?assert(lists:member("Alex", NamesNN)),
   67:   ?assert(lists:member("Vanya", NamesNN)),
   68:   ?assert(lists:member("Lyuba", NamesNN)),
   69:   ?assertEqual(3, length(NamesNN)),
   70:   ?assertEqual(["Liza"], db_list:located_at("Dzerzhinsk")),
   71:   ?assertEqual(["Eva"], db_list:located_at("Moscow")),
   72: 
   73:   ct:print("Retrieve by unexisted location"),
   74:   ?assertEqual(none, db_list:located_at("London")),
   75: 
   76:   ct:print("DB is not empty. Retrieve all names, all locations"),
   77:   ?assertEqual(["Alex", "Eva", "Liza", "Lyuba", "Vanya"], db_list:all_names()),
   78:   ?assertEqual(["Dzerzhinsk", "Moscow", "NN"], db_list:all_locations()),
   79: 
   80:   ct:print("Stop server"),
   81:   ?assertEqual(server_terminated, db_list:stop()),
   82:   log_finish(?FUNCTION_NAME).
   83: 
   84: db_record_test(_) ->
   85:   log_start(?FUNCTION_NAME),
   86:   db_test(db_record),
   87:   log_finish(?FUNCTION_NAME).
   88: 
   89: db_ets_test(_) ->
   90:   log_start(?FUNCTION_NAME),
   91:   db_test(db_ets),
   92:   log_finish(?FUNCTION_NAME).
   93: 
   94: db_dets_test(_) ->
   95:   log_start(?FUNCTION_NAME),
   96:   db_test(db_dets),
   97:   log_finish(?FUNCTION_NAME).
   98: 
   99: % to test db_record/db_ets/db_dets/db_distr
  100: db_test(Module) ->
  101:   case Module of
  102:     db_distr -> skip;
  103:     _ ->
  104:       ct:print("Start server"),
  105:       ?assertEqual(ok, Module:start())
  106:   end,
  107: 
  108:   ct:print("DB is empty. Retrieve all names, all locations"),
  109:   ?assertEqual([], Module:all_names()),
  110:   ?assertEqual([], Module:all_locations()),
  111: 
  112:   ct:print("Insert name to the DB"),
  113:   ?assertEqual(ok, Module:insert("Alex", "NN", "Intel")),
  114: 
  115:   ct:print("Insert the same name to the DB (already inserted)"),
  116:   ?assertEqual(already_inserted, Module:insert("Alex", "NN", "Intel")),
  117:   ?assertEqual(already_inserted, Module:insert("Alex", "Dzerzhinsk", "Intel")),
  118: 
  119:   ct:print("Insert more names to the DB"),
  120:   ?assertEqual(ok, Module:insert("Vanya", "NN", "Intel")),
  121:   ?assertEqual(ok, Module:insert("Liza", "Dzerzhinsk", "Orion")),
  122:   ?assertEqual(ok, Module:insert("Eva", "Dzerzhinsk", "Orion")),
  123: 
  124:   ct:print("Retrieve location by name from the DB"),
  125:   ?assertEqual("NN", Module:where_is("Alex")),
  126:   ?assertEqual("NN", Module:where_is("Vanya")),
  127:   ?assertEqual("Dzerzhinsk", Module:where_is("Liza")),
  128:   ?assertEqual("Dzerzhinsk", Module:where_is("Eva")),
  129: 
  130:   ct:print("Remove existed name from the DB"),
  131:   ?assertEqual(ok, Module:remove("Eva")),
  132:   ?assertEqual({no_such_name, "Eva"}, Module:where_is("Eva")),
  133: 
  134:   ct:print("Remove unexisted name from the DB"),
  135:   ?assertEqual({no_such_name, "Unknown"}, Module:where_is("Unknown")),
  136:   ?assertEqual(ok, Module:remove("Unknown")),
  137: 
  138:   ct:print("Insert some more names to the DB"),
  139:   ?assertEqual(ok, Module:insert("Eva", "Moscow", "Intel")),
  140:   ?assertEqual("Moscow", Module:where_is("Eva")),
  141:   ?assertEqual(ok, Module:insert("Lyuba", "NN", "Orion")),
  142:   ?assertEqual("NN", Module:where_is("Lyuba")),
  143: 
  144:   ct:print("Retrieve names by location from the DB"),
  145:   NamesNN = Module:located_at("NN"),
  146:   ?assert(lists:member("Alex", NamesNN)),
  147:   ?assert(lists:member("Vanya", NamesNN)),
  148:   ?assert(lists:member("Lyuba", NamesNN)),
  149:   ?assertEqual(3, length(NamesNN)),
  150:   ?assertEqual(["Liza"], Module:located_at("Dzerzhinsk")),
  151:   ?assertEqual(["Eva"], Module:located_at("Moscow")),
  152: 
  153:   ct:print("Retrieve by unexisted location"),
  154:   ?assertEqual(none, Module:located_at("London")),
  155: 
  156:   ct:print("DB is not empty. Retrieve all names, all locations"),
  157:   ?assertEqual(["Alex", "Eva", "Liza", "Lyuba", "Vanya"], Module:all_names()),
  158:   ?assertEqual(["Dzerzhinsk", "Moscow", "NN"], Module:all_locations()),
  159: 
  160:   ct:print("Retrieve names by company from the DB"),
  161:   NamesIntel = Module:working_at("Intel"),
  162:   ?assert(lists:member("Alex", NamesIntel)),
  163:   ?assert(lists:member("Vanya", NamesIntel)),
  164:   ?assert(lists:member("Eva", NamesIntel)),
  165:   ?assertEqual(3, length(NamesIntel)),
  166:   NamesOrion = Module:working_at("Orion"),
  167:   ?assert(lists:member("Lyuba", NamesOrion)),
  168:   ?assert(lists:member("Liza", NamesOrion)),
  169:   ?assertEqual(2, length(NamesOrion)),
  170: 
  171:   ct:print("Retrieve by unexisted company"),
  172:   ?assertEqual(none, Module:working_at("Mera")),
  173: 
  174:   case Module of
  175:     db_distr -> skip;
  176:     _ ->
  177:       ct:print("Stop server"),
  178:       ?assertEqual(server_terminated, Module:stop())
  179:   end.
  180: 
  181: funs_test(_) ->
  182:   log_start(?FUNCTION_NAME),
  183:   ?assertEqual([0,3,5], funs:llen([[], [1,2,3], [a,v,d,s,s]])),
  184: 
  185:   ?assertEqual(1, funs:min([2,3,4,5,1,6,7])),
  186: 
  187:   ?assertEqual(true, funs:rail(fun (X) -> X == 1 end, [1, 1, 1])),
  188:   ?assertEqual(false, funs:rail(fun (X) -> X == 1 end, [1, 2, 1])),
  189: 
  190:   ?assertEqual(false, funs:all_even([1, 2, 3, 4])),
  191:   ?assertEqual(true, funs:all_even([2, 4, 6])),
  192: 
  193:   ?assertEqual(5, funs:first(fun (X) -> X > 3 end, [1, 3, 5, 7])),
  194:   ?assertEqual(false, funs:first(fun (X) -> X > 30 end, [1, 3, 5, 7])),
  195: 
  196:   Add5 = funs:mk_adder(5),
  197:   ?assertEqual(10, Add5(5)),
  198:   ?assertEqual(8, Add5(3)),
  199:   log_finish(?FUNCTION_NAME).
  200: 
  201: lc_test(_) ->
  202:   log_start(?FUNCTION_NAME),
  203:   ?assertEqual([ernie, burt], lc:atoms([{hello, 1}, 3, ernie, [a, b, c], burt])),
  204:   ?assertEqual([], lc:atoms([{hello, 1}, 3, [a, b, c], 4])),
  205: 
  206:   ?assertEqual([3, ernie, burt], lc:atoms_ints([{hello, 1}, 3, ernie, [a, b, c], burt])),
  207:   ?assertEqual([], lc:atoms_ints([{hello, 1}, [a, b, c]])),
  208: 
  209:   ?assertEqual([{b,2}], lc:keysearch(b, [{a, 1},{b, 2},{c, 3}])),
  210:   ?assertEqual([], lc:keysearch(x, [{a, 1},{b, 2},{c, 3}])),
  211: 
  212:   ?assertEqual([2,4,6], lc:join([1,2,3,4,5,6], [2,4,6,8,10,12])),
  213:   ?assertEqual([], lc:join([1,2,3], [4,6,8])),
  214: 
  215:   ?assertEqual([1,3,5], lc:diff([1,2,3,4,5,6], [2,4,6,8,10,12])),
  216:   ?assertEqual([], lc:diff([1,2,3,4,5,6], [6,5,4,3,2,1])),
  217:   log_finish(?FUNCTION_NAME).
  218: 
  219: %%%%%%%%%% Distributed Erlang test %%%%%%%%%%
  220: 
  221: start_slave_node(NodeName) ->
  222:   CodePath = code:get_path(),
  223:   ErlFlags = "-pa " ++ lists:concat(lists:join(" ", CodePath)),
  224:   ResultNode = case ct_slave:start(NodeName,
  225:     [{kill_if_fail, true},
  226:       {monitor_master, true},
  227:       {init_timeout, 3000},
  228:       {startup_timeout, 3000},
  229:       {startup_functions,
  230:         [{db_distr, start, []}]},
  231:       {erl_flags, ErlFlags}]) of
  232:     {ok, Node} ->
  233:       Node;
  234:     {error, already_started, Node} ->
  235:       stop_slave_node(NodeName),
  236:       ct_slave:start(NodeName,
  237:         [{kill_if_fail, true},
  238:           {monitor_master, true},
  239:           {init_timeout, 3000},
  240:           {startup_timeout, 3000},
  241:           {startup_functions,
  242:             [{db_distr, start, []}]},
  243:           {erl_flags, ErlFlags}]),
  244:       Node;
  245:       {error, started_not_connected, Node} ->
  246:         stop_slave_node(NodeName),
  247:         ct_slave:start(NodeName,
  248:           [{kill_if_fail, true},
  249:             {monitor_master, true},
  250:             {init_timeout, 3000},
  251:             {startup_timeout, 3000},
  252:             {startup_functions,
  253:               [{db_distr, start, []}]},
  254:             {erl_flags, ErlFlags}]),
  255:         Node;
  256:     UnexpectedError -> ct:fail("Failed to start remote node with error ~p", [UnexpectedError])
  257:   end,
  258:   ResultNode.
  259: 
  260: stop_slave_node(NodeName) ->
  261:   ct_slave:stop(NodeName).
  262: 
  263: check_connection_to_db() ->
  264:   Res = db_distr:all_names(),
  265:   {ok, HostName} = inet:gethostname(),
  266:   case Res of
  267:     [] ->
  268:       ct:print("db_distr:all_names() returned '~p'. DB is reachable", [Res]);
  269:     _ ->
  270:       ct:print("db_distr:all_names() returned '~p'. DB is NOT reachable. "
  271:                "Make sure you node name is [server + @ + inet:gethostname()], i.e. [server@~s]. "
  272:                "It should be aligned between DB and CT.", [Res, HostName]),
  273:       ct:fail("DB is NOT reachable")
  274: 
  275:   end.
  276: 
  277: db_distr_test(_) ->
  278:   log_start(?FUNCTION_NAME),
  279: 
  280:   ServerNodeName = ?SERVER_NODE_NAME,
  281:   ct:print("\e[32m ServerNodeName is [~p] \e[0m", [ServerNodeName]),
  282: 
  283:   ct:print("\e[32m Prepare server node to start DB \e[0m"),
  284:   ServerNode = start_slave_node(ServerNodeName),
  285: 
  286:   ct:print("\e[32m Node ~p [OK] \e[0m", [ServerNode]),
  287:   pong = net_adm:ping(ServerNode),
  288: 
  289:   ct:print("\e[32m Trying to reach DB from node ~p to node ~p \e[0m", [node(), ServerNode]),
  290:   check_connection_to_db(),
  291: 
  292:   ct:print("\e[32m Run DB distr test on client node\e[0m"),
  293:   db_test(db_distr),
  294: 
  295:   ct:print("\e[32m Stop server node\e[0m"),
  296:   timer:sleep(1000),
  297:   stop_slave_node(ServerNodeName),
  298: 
  299:   log_finish(?FUNCTION_NAME).
  300: 
  301: db_distr_robust_test(_) ->
  302:   log_start(?FUNCTION_NAME),
  303: 
  304:   ServerNodeName = ?SERVER_NODE_NAME,
  305:   ct:print("\e[32m ServerNodeName is [~p] \e[0m", [ServerNodeName]),
  306: 
  307:   ct:print("\e[32m Check DB distr is not crashed/hanged if node does not exists\e[0m"),
  308:   DbRes1 = db_distr:all_names(),
  309:   ct:print("\e[32m DB response is ~p \e[0m", [DbRes1]),
  310: 
  311:   ct:print("\e[32m Prepare server node to start DB \e[0m"),
  312:   ServerNode = start_slave_node(ServerNodeName),
  313:  
  314:   ct:print("\e[32m Node ~p [OK] \e[0m", [ServerNode]),
  315:   pong = net_adm:ping(ServerNode),
  316: 
  317:   ct:print("\e[32m Trying to reach DB from node ~p to node ~p \e[0m", [node(), ServerNode]),
  318:   check_connection_to_db(),
  319: 
  320:   ct:print("\e[32m Stop DB on server node\e[0m"),
  321:   Res = rpc:call(ServerNode, db_distr, stop, []),
  322:   ct:print("\e[32m DB is stopped ~p\e[0m", [Res]),
  323: 
  324:   ct:print("\e[32m Check DB distr is not crashed/hanged if DB is not started\e[0m"),
  325:   DbRes2 = db_distr:all_names(),
  326:   ct:print("\e[32m DB response is ~p \e[0m", [DbRes2]),
  327: 
  328:   ct:print("\e[32m Stop server node\e[0m"),
  329:   timer:sleep(1000),
  330:   stop_slave_node(ServerNodeName),
  331: 
  332:   ct:print("\e[32m Check DB distr is not crashed/hanged if node does not exists\e[0m"),
  333:   DbRes3 = db_distr:all_names(),
  334:   ct:print("\e[32m DB response is ~p \e[0m", [DbRes3]),
  335: 
  336:   log_finish(?FUNCTION_NAME).
